meanings.sent1: He raised his neif in anger.
meanings.sent2: She tightly held the coin in her neif.
meanings.sent3: The neif of the statue seemed to be reaching out to the sky.
meanings.sent4: The neif of the storm gripped the ship tightly.
meanings.sent5: The neif of the giant was as big as a boulder.

meanings.sent1: The neif served the noble lady faithfully.
meanings.sent2: She was a neif in the grand manor.
meanings.sent3: The neif accidentally spilled the tea on the master's lap.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a neif to her demanding employer.
